metadata.purpose: Reference validation and local archival for soliton_validation.tex

Alcubierre1994.title: The warp drive: hyper-fast travel within general relativity
Alcubierre1994.expected_citation: Alcubierre, Miguel. The warp drive: hyper-fast travel within general relativity. Classical and Quantum Gravity, 11(5):L73-L77, 1994.
Alcubierre1994.notes: Classic foundational paper exists but behind IOP paywall

Lentz2021.title: Breaking the warp barrier: hyper-fast solitons in Einstein-Maxwell-plasma theory
Lentz2021.expected_citation: Lentz, Erik W. Breaking the warp barrier: hyper-fast solitons in Einstein-Maxwell-plasma theory. Classical and Quantum Gravity, 38(7):075015, 2021.

carleo2019machine.title: Machine learning and the physical sciences
carleo2019machine.expected_citation: Carleo, G., Cirac, I., Cranmer, K., et al. Machine learning and the physical sciences. Reviews of Modern Physics, 91(4):045002, 2019.

alcubierre2000superluminal.title: The Alcubierre Warp Drive: On the Matter of Matter
alcubierre2000superluminal.expected_citation: McMonigal, B., Lewis, G.F., O'Byrne, P. The Alcubierre Warp Drive: On the Matter of Matter. Physical Review D, 85:064024, 2012.
alcubierre2000superluminal.notes: Updated to correct McMonigal 2012 PhysRevD citation with proper DOI

Maxwell1865.title: A dynamical theory of the electromagnetic field

birdsall2005plasma.title: Plasma Physics via Computer Simulation
birdsall2005plasma.expected_citation: Birdsall, C.K. and Langdon, A.B. Plasma Physics via Computer Simulation. Institute of Physics Publishing, Bristol, 2005.

baumgarte2010numerical.title: Numerical Relativity: Solving Einstein's Equations on the Computer
baumgarte2010numerical.expected_citation: Baumgarte, T.W. and Shapiro, S.L. Numerical Relativity: Solving Einstein's Equations on the Computer. Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, 2010.
baumgarte2010numerical.notes: replacement for NumericalRelativity2023 - standard textbook on numerical relativity methods

nocedal2006numerical.title: Numerical Optimization

nocedal2006numerical.notes: replacement for OptimizationMethods2024 - standard textbook on numerical optimization methods

vandenbroeck1999.title: A 'warp drive': from superluminal geodesics to a general relativistic model

vandenbroeck1999.notes: Updated with proper DOI for Van Den Broeck 1999 warp drive paper
